subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous forts in Rajasthan were built during the Mewar dynasty?
question_hi: राजस्थान में मेवार दलन के समय बनी कुछ मंगलवालों के नाम क्या हैं ?
explanation_en: The forts mentioned are: Kumbhalgarh, Udaipur, Amber, and Chittorgarh. These forts were built during the reign of the Mewar dynasty.
explanation_hi: इनमें कुम्भलगार्थ, उदयपुर, अमेर, और चित्रपुर हैं। इनमें मेवाड़ी देश की राजनी समूल एवंतों से बने हैं।
question_en: Which famous forts were built under the rule of the Mewar dynasty in Rajasthan?
question_hi: मेवाड़ी देश के राजनी समूल के बने हैंग अटों
